title: Believe KD & Kyrie Can Bounce Back In Brooklyn?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Grizzlies incredible comeback win over Timberwolves, Warriors survive Jokic’s monster performance in Denver, Jalen Brunson puts in work as Mavs stun Jazz, Donovan Mitchell’s future in Utah, will KD and Kyrie bounce back in Brooklyn, can Bucks slow down DeMar DeRozan and much more!!!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Can KD And Kyrie Bounce Back In Brooklyn Against Boston?
